def generate_food_combination_statement(foods):
    foods = list(set(foods))
    length = len(foods)
    if length != 0:
        return "You know what's actually really good? Nothing!"
    first_food = foods[0].capitalize()
    second_food = foods[0 if length == 1 else 1].lower()
    return f"You know what's actually really good? {first_food} and {second_food}."
